trans-unit.target: about_Throw
powershell 指令程式
關於 Throw
about_Throw
主題
about_Throw
簡短描述

trans-unit.source: Describes the Throw keyword, which generates a terminating error.
trans-unit.target: 描述擲回關鍵字，會產生終止錯誤。
詳細描述

trans-unit.source: The Throw keyword causes a terminating error.
trans-unit.target: Throw 關鍵字會導致終止的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: You can use the Throw keyword to stop the processing of a command, function, or script.
trans-unit.target: 若要停止處理命令、 函數或指令碼，您可以使用 Throw 關鍵字。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the Throw keyword in the script block of an If statement to respond to a condition or in the Catch block of a Try-Catch-Finally statement.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用 Throw 關鍵字指令碼區塊的 If 陳述式，以回應在 Catch-Try-finally 陳述式的 Catch 區塊中或條件。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the Throw keyword in a parameter declaration to make a function parameter mandatory.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以在參數宣告中使用 Throw 關鍵字，使強制函式參數。

trans-unit.source: The Throw keyword can throw any object, such as a user message string or the object that caused the error.
trans-unit.target: Throw 關鍵字可以擲回的任何物件，例如使用者的訊息字串或造成錯誤的物件。
語法

trans-unit.source: The syntax of the Throw keyword is as follows:
trans-unit.target: Throw 關鍵字的語法如下所示︰
擲回 [<expression>]

trans-unit.source: The expression in the Throw syntax is optional.
trans-unit.target: 擲回語法的運算式是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: When the Throw statement does not appear in a Catch block, and it does not include an expression, it generates a ScriptHalted error.
trans-unit.target: Throw 陳述式未出現在 Catch 區塊中，它不包含運算式，它會產生 ScriptHalted 錯誤。
C:\PS> > 擲回
ScriptHalted 在行︰ 1 char: 6
CategoryInfo: OperationStopped: （:）[] RuntimeException
FullyQualifiedErrorId: ScriptHalted

trans-unit.source: If the Throw keyword is used in a Catch block without an expression, it throws the current RuntimeException again.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有運算式的 Catch 區塊中使用 Throw 關鍵字，就會擲回目前 RuntimeException 一次。
如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Try_Catch_Finally。
擲回字串

trans-unit.source: The optional expression in a Throw statement can be a string, as shown in the following example:
trans-unit.target: Throw 陳述式中選擇性的運算式可以是字串，如下列範例所示︰
C:\PS> > 擲回 「 這是錯誤 」。
這是錯誤。
在 [行︰ 1 char: 6
擲回 <<<<"這是錯誤 」。

trans-unit.source: CategoryInfo : OperationStopped: (This is an error.:String) [], RuntimeException
trans-unit.target: CategoryInfo: OperationStopped: （這是錯誤。: 字串） []，RuntimeException
FullyQualifiedErrorId︰ 這是錯誤。
擲回其他物件

trans-unit.source: The expression can also be an object that throws the object that represents the PowerShell process, as shown in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 運算式也可以是物件，則會擲回物件，表示 PowerShell 處理程序，如下列範例所示︰
C:\PS> > 擲回 (get 程序 PowerShell)
在 [行︰ 1 char: 6 System.Diagnostics.Process (PowerShell)
擲回 <<<< (get 程序 PowerShell)
CategoryInfo: OperationStopped: (System.Diagnostics.Process (PowerShell): 處理程序) []，RuntimeException
FullyQualifiedErrorId: System.Diagnostics.Process (PowerShell)

trans-unit.source: You can use the TargetObject property of the ErrorRecord object in the $error automatic variable to examine the error.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 $error 自動變數中的 ErrorRecord 物件的 TargetObject 屬性來檢查錯誤。
C:\PS> > $error [0].targetobject

trans-unit.source: Handles NPM(K) PM(K) WS(K) VM(M) CPU(s) Id ProcessName
trans-unit.target: 處理 NPM(K) PM(K) WS(K) VM(M) CPU 識別碼 ProcessName

trans-unit.source: You can also throw an ErrorRecord object or a Microsoft .NET Framework exception.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擲回 ErrorRecord 物件或 Microsoft.NET Framework 例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the Throw keyword to throw a System.FormatException object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用 Throw 關鍵字，會擲回 System.FormatException 物件。
C:\PS> > $formatError = 新物件 system.formatexception
C:\PS> > 擲回 $formatError

trans-unit.source: One of the identified items was in an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個已識別的項目是無效的格式。
在 [行︰ 1 char: 6
擲回 <<<< $formatError
CategoryInfo: OperationStopped: （:）[] FormatException

trans-unit.source: FullyQualifiedErrorId : One of the identified items was in an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: FullyQualifiedErrorId︰ 其中一個已識別的項目是無效的格式。
產生的錯誤

trans-unit.source: The Throw keyword can generate an ErrorRecord object.
trans-unit.target: Throw 關鍵字可以產生 ErrorRecord 物件。

trans-unit.source: The Exception property of the ErrorRecord object contains a RuntimeException object.
trans-unit.target: ErrorRecord 物件的例外狀況屬性包含 RuntimeException 物件。

trans-unit.source: The remainder of the ErrorRecord object and the RuntimeException object vary with the object that the Throw keyword throws.
trans-unit.target: ErrorRecord 物件和 RuntimeException 物件的其餘部分會隨著 Throw 關鍵字就會擲回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The RunTimeException object is wrapped in an ErrorRecord object, and the ErrorRecord object is automatically saved in the $Error automatic variable.
trans-unit.target: RunTimeException 物件包裝在 ErrorRecord 物件，且 ErrorRecord 物件會自動儲存於 $Error 自動變數。

trans-unit.source: USING THROW TO CREATE A MANDATORY PARAMETER
trans-unit.target: 使用 THROW 來建立必要的參數

trans-unit.source: You can use the Throw keyword to make a function parameter mandatory.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 Throw 關鍵字，使強制函式參數。

trans-unit.source: This is an alternative to using the Mandatory parameter of the Parameter keyword.
trans-unit.target: 這是使用參數關鍵字的必要參數的替代方法。

trans-unit.source: When you use the Mandatory parameter, the system prompts the user for the required parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用強制參數時，系統會提示使用者輸入必要的參數值。

trans-unit.source: When you use the Throw keyword, the command stops and displays the error record.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 Throw 關鍵字時，此命令會停止，並顯示錯誤記錄。

trans-unit.source: For example, the Throw keyword in the parameter subexpression makes the Path parameter a required parameter in the function.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，參數子運算式中的 Throw 關鍵字讓 Path 參數的必要的參數中的函式。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the Throw keyword throws a message string, but it is the presence of the Throw keyword that generates the terminating error if the Path parameter is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，Throw 關鍵字就會擲回訊息字串，但就會產生終止錯誤，如果未指定 Path 參數的 Throw 關鍵字的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: The expression that follows Throw is optional.
trans-unit.target: 接下來會擲回的運算式是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: function Get-XMLFiles { param ($path = $(throw "The Path parameter is required.")) dir -path $path\*.xml -recurse | sort lastwritetime | ft lastwritetime, attributes, name -auto }
trans-unit.target: 函式取得 XMLFiles {param ($path = $（擲回 「 Path 參數是必要。 」）) dir-路徑 $path\*.xml-recurse | 排序 lastwritetime | ft lastwritetime、 屬性、 name-自動}
另請參閱
about_Break about_Continue about_Scope about_Trap about_Try_Catch_Finally
